00010 GLTexture::GLTexture() {
00011         m_glTextureID = 0;
00012         glGenTextures(1, &m_glTextureID);
00013

00022 void GLTexture::loadTextureData(InputDataFormat format, unsigned int width,
00023                 unsigned int height, bool generateMipMaps, void* inputData) {
00024 
00025         if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
00026 
00027                 stringstream dbgIdStrm;
00028                 dbgIdStrm << textureDebugIdentifier;
00029 
00030                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeLine(
00031                                 TAG,
00032                                 string("Texture ID: ") + dbgIdStrm.str()
00033                                                 + " called with a bad with or height");
00034 
00035                 return;
00036         }
00037 
00038         //Test if the width is a power of two (Width BITWISEAND (Width - 1)) will only equal 0 when it is a power of two
00039         if ((width & (width - 1)) != 0) {
00040 
00041                 stringstream dbgIdStrm;
00042                 dbgIdStrm << textureDebugIdentifier;
00043 
00044                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeLine(
00045                                 TAG,
00046                                 string("Texture ID: ") + dbgIdStrm.str()
00047                                                 + " Attempting to buffer texture with no pow 2 texture");
00048 
00049                 return;
00050         }
00051 
00052         GLuint internalFormat = 0;
00053         GLuint dataFormat = 0;
00054 
00055         switch (format) {
00056         case input_data_byte_rgb: {
00057                 internalFormat = GL_RGB;
00058                 dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00059 
00060                 break;
00061         }
00062                 ;
00063 
00064         case input_data_float_rgb: {
00065                 internalFormat = GL_RGB;
00066                 dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00067 
00068                 break;
00069         }
00070                 ;
00071 
00072         case input_data_byte_rgba: {
00073 
00074                 internalFormat = GL_RGBA;
00075                 dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00076 
00077                 break;
00078         }
00079                 ;
00080 
00081         case input_data_float_rgba: {
00082                 internalFormat = GL_RGBA;
00083                 dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00084 
00085                 break;
00086         }
00087                 ;
00088 
00089         case input_data_byte_luminance: {
00090                 internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE;
00091                 dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00092 
00093                 break;
00094         }
00095 
00096         case input_data_float_luminance: {
00097 
00098                 internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE;
00099                 dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00100 
00101                 break;
00102         }
00103                 ;
00104 
00105         case input_data_byte_luminance_alpha: {
00106                 internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA;
00107                 dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00108 
00109                 break;
00110         }
00111                 ;
00112 
00113         case input_data_float_luminance_alpha: {
00114                 internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA;
00115                 dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00116                 break;
00117         }
00118                 ;
00119 
00120         default: {
00121 
00122                 printf("Unknown format");
00123                 return;
00124 
00125         }
00126                 ;
00127 
00128         }
00129 
00130         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_glTextureID);
00131 
00132         if (generateMipMaps == true)
00133                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_TRUE);
00134         else
00135                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_FALSE);
00136 
00137         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, internalFormat, width, height, 0,
00138                         internalFormat, dataFormat, inputData);
00139 
00140         if (generateMipMaps == true) {
00141                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER,
00142                                 GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00143                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER,
00144                                 GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00145         } else {
00146 
00147                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00148                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00149 
00150         }
00151 
00152         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00153 
00154         m_textureWidth = width;
00155         m_textureHeight = height;
00156 }

00158 void GLTexture::makeActive() {
00159 
00160         if (m_glTextureID != 0) {
00161 
00162                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_glTextureID);

00164         }
